name: Hold the Line!
description:
Your planet has been invaded by mysterious aliens! They cannot survive on our soil for long so they are expanding their territory through creep!

There's not much you can do but wait for help. Hold the line until you can be extracted!

Mouse only game. Click the cards on the bottom to build your defences.

Creep cannot advance into tiles created by your hub. However the enemy will send enemies to try and destroy your main core and anything in their way.
